CSS style for black background color.
board - Static variable in class controller.GUI
TicTacToeBoard object that contains the logic and game state for the Tic-Tac-Toe game.
board - Static variable in class controller.UIBoardActions
Defines the logic, state, and data associated with the board that will be used to update the UI board, switch turns, update scores, and notify the user of a tie or win.
Board - Interface in model
This is an interface for a Tic-Tac-Toe board.
BOARD_COLS - Static variable in interface model.Board
Number of columns on Tic-Tac-Toe board.
BOARD_HEIGHT - Static variable in class view.UIConstants
The height of the game board.
BOARD_ROWS - Static variable in interface model.Board
Number of rows on Tic-Tac-Toe board.
BOARD_SCENE_SPACING - Static variable in class view.UIConstants
The spacing between elements in the game scene.
BOARD_TILE_FONTSIZE - Static variable in class view.UIConstants
The font size of the board tile.
BOARD_TILE_HEIGHT - Static variable in class view.UIConstants
The height of a tile on the game board.
BOARD_TILE_WIDTH - Static variable in class view.UIConstants
The width of a tile on the game board.
BOARD_WIDTH - Static variable in class view.UIConstants
The width of the game board.
BOLD_FONT - Static variable in class view.CSSStyles
CSS style for bold font weight.
BUTTON_GAMEMODE_HEIGHT - Static variable in class view.UIConstants
The height of the button used for game mode selection in the home scene.
